Name: Orange Cast: Sci-Fi Space Action Game
About the game: As humanity’s elite space trooper, you take on a heroic, action-packed adventure throughout the galaxy. Explore planets, protect colonies, and be the first to meet the unknown! Explore the Galaxy Visit planets, discover new dimensions, survive hazard environments. Protect Humanity Fast-paced and rewarding combat. Face cunning enemies, defeat menacing bosses, and arm yourself with top-notch weaponry of your choice. Enjoy the view The beauty of Space awaits you. The beautiful and deep soundtrack, spectacular views of Cosmos, the mystery of alien planets, and the romance of space travels. True Sci-Fi experience Dialogs, cinematics, and the choice-driven story inspired by James S.A. Corey’s The Expanse series.
